mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticket (association_id, departure_day, departure_time, departure_place, destination, price, seat_num, seat_surplus, type, issue_time, state) VALUES (#{associationId}, #{departureDay}, #{departureTime}, #{departurePlace}, #{destination}, #{price}, #{seatNum}, #{seatSurplus}, #{type}, #{issueTime}, #{state})
mapper.select: SELECT t.ticket_id AS ticketId, t.association_id AS associationId, ha.association_name AS associationName, t.departure_day AS departureDay, t.departure_time AS departuretime, t.departure_place AS departurePlace, t.destination, t.price, t.seat_num AS seatNum, t.seat_surplus AS seatSurplus, t.type, t.issue_time AS issueTime FROM ticket t, hometown_association ha WHERE t.state = #{state} AND t.association_id = ha.association_id LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
mapper.update: UPDATE ticket SET license_plate_number = #{licensePlateNumber}, vehicle_type = #{vehicleType}, color = #{color}, driver_name = #{driverName}, driver_phone = #{driverPhone} WHERE ticket_id = #{ticketId}
mapper.select: SELECT license_plate_number AS licensePlateNumber, vehicle_type AS vehicleType, color, driver_name AS driverName, driver_phone AS driverPhone FROM ticket WHERE ticket_id = #{ticketId}

SELECT ui.username AS name, ui.phone, ao.price, tor.travel_num AS buyNum, ao.make_order_time AS buyTime FROM user_info ui, association_order ao, travel_order tor WHERE ao.ticket_id = #{ticketId} AND tor.travel_order_id = ao.travel_order_id AND ui.uid = tor.uid LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_info ui, association_order ao, travel_order tor WHERE ao.ticket_id = #{ticketId} AND tor.travel_order_id = ao.travel_order_id AND ui.uid = tor.uid
